laboratory_examinations.findings: Abnormal decrement (>10%) in the compound muscle action potential (CMAP) amplitude
CMAP amplitude increased by 94% after 1 minute of exercise; decrement was 37% after 2 minutes
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: This finding is diagnostic of a presynaptic neuromuscular-junction condition

laboratory_examinations.findings: Anti-Hu antibodies at a titer of 1:1920; P/Q-type calcium-channel antibody level of 0.45 nmol per liter (normal level, <0.02)
Right precarinal lymph node 1.9 cm in diameter (max standardized uptake value of 7.7) and right hilar lymph node 1 cm in diameter (max standardized uptake value of 2.6)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Reduction in the size of the precarinal and right hilar lymph nodes at the 6-month follow-up

laboratory_examinations.findings: Persistent changes consistent with limbic encephalitis but no signs of metastasis
